alert.note: Alert for Dane; Iowa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 2:21PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT IOWA AND SOUTHWESTERN DANE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM CDT... At 221 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mineral Point, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Horeb, Dodgeville, Mineral Point, Barneveld, Blue Mounds, Arena, Ridgeway, Linden, Cobb, Rewey, Hollandale, Governor Dodge St Park, Edmund, Blue Mound St Park, Mount Vernon, Blackhawk Lake Rec Area, London, and Jonesdale. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 18 between mile markers 49 and 69. U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 34 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
